Name: Oasis
Notes: This children's opera is an amazing piece of art. Its catchy melodies were sung beautifully by the children, who clearly enjoyed performing the opera. Children and older viewers alike will find in it something that can affect their artistic sensibilities, or even affect the timeless idea of life. The beautiful oriental and Old Testament themes are revealed to opera viewers.
